revised_title: Analytical Determination of Mean Relative Trajectories in Weak Electrolytes
tldr: The authors analyze the mean relative trajectories of ions in a weak electrolyte under a uniform electric field. They derive equations for the mean relative motion of neighboring ions and determine the mean times involved in the processes of dissociation and recombination. The study contributes to the understanding of ion behavior in weak electrolytes and has implications for theoretical models of electrolytic dissociation and recombination.
